title: Herro: Glencore worth substantially more than current value
itunes:title: Herro: Glencore worth substantially more than current value
description:
Harris Associates' David Herro discusses investments in Glencore and Credit Suisse. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.
